Title: Pozegnanie jesieni
Writer: Wojciech Nowak, Mariusz Trelinski, Stanislaw Ignacy Witkiewicz (novel), Janusz Wróblewski
Actors: Jan Frycz, Maria Pakulnis, Grazyna Trela, Henryk Bista
Plot: Decadence, homosexuality, excess wealth, infidelity, alcoholism and drugs all played a major role in the decline of aristocracy.
